Poraz sa četiri gola razlike na Marakani, samo još Fjorentina 1965. godine
U bogatoj istoriji kluba, samo tri puta su crveno-beli na svom terenu gubili više od dva gola razlike...

06 Nov 2019

Vremena su bila drugačija, Crvena zvezda je postavljala ozbiljnu evropsku silu. Jaz između bogatih i siromašnih u međuvremenu je produbljen i više no što bi većina navijača volela, ali jasno je da se o tome pitaju baš oni – bogati. A mi tu nismo, pa smo prinuđeni da se polako navikavamo na sasvim drugačiju fudbalsku realnost. Nažalost, ona nam ne ide u korist, pa je Crvena zvezda tako večeras izjednačila negativan rekord kluba.
Nisu crveno-beli zaslužili ovako visok poraz, ali će u klupskim almanasima ostati zapisano da je Crvena zvezda 11. novembra 2019. godine protiv Totenhema na stadionu “Rajko Mitić“ doživela jedan od dva  najteža poraza tokom 58 sezona učešća u evropskim takmičenjima i ukupno 170 utakmica na domaćem terenu u evrokupovima.
Samo tri puta do sada je Zvezda na svom terenu gubila sa više od dva gola razlike. A samo dva puta sa četiri razlike. Nije uvek prijatno prisećati se, ali treba pamtiti, jer tako se uči i raste.

NAJUBEDLJIVIJI ZVEZDINI PORAZI

Defeat with four goals difference in Marakana, only Fiorentina in 1965
In the club's rich history, only three times have the Red and White team lost more than two goals difference ...

06 Nov 2019

Times were different, the Red Star was setting a serious European power. The gap between rich and poor, meanwhile, has widened beyond what most fans would like, but it is clear that it is the rich who are wondering. And we're not here, so we're forced to slowly get used to a completely different football reality. Unfortunately, it is not to our advantage, so Red Star evened the club's negative record tonight.
The Red and Whites did not deserve such a big defeat, but the club almanacs will state that on November 11, 2019, Red Star suffered against Tottenham at the Rajko Mitic Stadium one of the two most severe defeats during 58 seasons of participation in European competitions and a total of 170 home game in Euro Cups.
Only three times so far has Zvezda lost in their field with more than two goals difference. And only twice with four differences. It is not always pleasant to remember, but it should be remembered, because that is how it learns and grows.

THE MOST BEAUTIFUL STARS TO DEFEAT


1965 City Fair Cup: Fiorentina (0: 4) European Championship Cup 1977: Borussia Monchengladbach (0: 3)

Champions League 2018: Paris Saint-Germain (1: 4) Champions League 2019: Tottenham (0: 4)
